content.detailedDescription: When i was driving to work around 11:15 pm a thought came in my mind that asked me "would you like to see me?"  i was in the middle of no were alone.  i just had this feeling that this was from god so i said "sure i would like to see you" but in the back of my mind i considered that it could be something else. nothing else happened right then so i shrug it off and continued to drive to work (i am a security guard) .  i started my shift.  around 2:00 or 3:00 a.M. another thought came in my mind like the first that asked me if i wanted to make up a story about god coming to see me.  i thought for a second yes but i know that that was not my thought, that some how that thought was also put in my head at the same time (this sounds strange but i am telling you the truth i think it was a test to see if i was honest)and i over rode the thought and said "no i can't do that to god".  i looked out the window  and noticed a large grasshopper sitting on the fence about 12 feet away from me.  as i looked at the grasshopper an e.T. fadded in between me and the grasshopper only about 6 feet away just outside the window (i got a really good look at him)and gave me a message then fadded back out.  he said the message was from god.  i later gave the message to a local church and tried to get them to help me figure out what had happened but they wouldn't help me.  they said that they thought i was crazy (they referred me to a mental hospital).  that really hurt, here i was going to the only place i thought i could count on for help with something spirit related and they said that.  i would like to add that since this has happened i have never thought more clearer and my memory has imporved five times since.  i have also noticed that i understand bible and am currently figuring out its mysteries.  i believe that i have indeed seen jesus.  i am willing to take a lie detector test and any other test to prove that i am telling the truth about this. while this was happening to me an intence fear overtook my whole body.  the e.T. said that this is a side effect of the way that they comunicate and don't be affraid.  i have noticed that they can give you a long message in a very short amont of time.  since this has happened i have had a couple of these visit mostly at night in my sleep where they have downloaded a bunch of information about the bible in my head. now i know when they are around because of this intence fear when they comunicate, but they have not showed there self since this first visit (i would be able to explain better in person about this fear and what it means).  i would give you the message myself but i was told by them not to give out the message because i messed up and accidently changed it when i keep trying to get help from the church.  i will tell you what churches i gave the message to so you can get a copy of it if you like.  i would like to add that i have no doubt that this was indeed jesus. yeshua. this was an important event and i hope you give me some consideration.  thanks carl
content.summary: E.T. message given to me

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my front porch listening to the radio, facing the south. at about 9:48 pm local time, i looked up and saw a very bright light in the sky travelling approximatly from ssw to nne. at first i thought it was an iridium flare as it was as bright as one of them, but it never diminished in brightness. it travelled about the speed and distance of the iridium satellites i have seen, but it was travelling in a different path from the parallel paths i have seen them go. i ran into the house and grabbed some binoculars. it appeared to be circular with lines (rods?) radiating out every 30 degrees each about the same length of the radius of the object itself. it was travelling at variable speed and occasionally curving in its movement. there were no flashing lights as would be seen on an aircraft. i followed it with my binoculars as long as i could until it went out of sight to the nne. whatever it was, it looked like it had to be in space. it was about five times larger than satellites i have observed. it was not a meteor. i have never observed anything like it. i am the episcopal priest in texas city, texas. 38 years old
content.summary: Extremely bright variably moving object

content.detailedDescription: Our experience lasted over several days. it was very unusual as measured against stories in the press. it is a long story, and do not want to spend time on a narrative unless there is any interest. myself, my wife, and our neighbor couple with 3 kids were taken. we lived in an isolated area. let me know if a narrative of something that happened that long ago is of interest to you. we could not report this incident at the time because i worked on programming the fire control computers on the fbm subs. my security clearance was top secret as was my neighbor. neither of us could talk about our work to each other. i never knew what he did at the base. we would both have lost our jobs by reporting this incident.
content.summary: Abduction

content.detailedDescription:
i have no way to prove this, and i've told only a few people over the years. after all, who would believe me? i am 49 years old, and saw what i know now to be a ufo, when i was about 15 years old. i can still see the disc in my mind's eye, as if it happened only recently.
   i'm guessing that it was close to 9:00 p.M. when it occurred. i was driving home from a church choir rehearsal(i had been driving since i was about 11 years old. this was not uncommon in rural south arkansas), and not really thinking about anything in particular. the road we lived on had several rolling hills. as i topped the first in a series of three of these hills, i screamed as i saw a very, very large luminescent silver disc that filled the sky in front of me. our home could have fit inside of it several times over! it seemed to hang suspended in the air at a 45 degree angle, and made no sound. i kept on driving but my eyes never left this sight. on top of the disc was a smaller dome-like area surrounded by multi-colored lights. the color was like nothing i had ever seen. it is difficult even now to describe. i know that it was silver, but it also had another quality about it. i can only describe it as a "glow". even that does not adequately describe it.
   as i continued to drive toward home, the next hill i ascended blocked my view for a moment. when i reached the top of the next hill, the object had disappeared. it had only been a matter of seconds since it left my view! i was terrified, and raced to tell my parents what i had seen. i was truly afraid, and very convinced that this "flying saucer" had literally landed in our yard. (we lived on a 7 acre tract) in my haste to get inside the house, i skinned my knee jumping out of the car. the pain of the scrape was nothing compared to the fear i was feeling. 
   when i told my mother what i had seen, she laughed at me, and tried to explain it away by telling me that it must have been "only a weather balloon"! nothing i described to her even came close to changing her mind.
   i have been a nurse for the last 25 years, and work in a local emergency room. i am a wife, mother and grandmother. for all intents and purposes, i live an ordinary life. 
   the memory of that night remains fresh in my mind. i know how insane this would sound to most people, so i have kept it mostly to myself, telling only a few people over the years.
content.summary: Huge luminicent silver disc w/multi-colored lights around upper dome
Abduction

content.detailedDescription:
1.  i was with my pastor, two evangelists, and my pastor's agnostic niece.  we were driving from la to co to visit my pastor's family and celibrate new years.  we were on the highway in oklahoma city (if i remember correctly)  it was between maybe 8 and 10 pm.  

2.  my pastor and i both saw three orbs moving irratically in front of us in the sky.  i asked, "what are those?"  they were opaque yet transparent at the same time, swirling colors, zipping, zig zagging.  i looked to the right, above us, and there was a huge black thing with lots of tiny lights.  it was completely silent.  my first thought was, "mercy, its as big as a football field!"  

3.  the pastor, the two evangelists, and myself were gaping in awe at the orbs and the huge ship on the right, in the sky. in unison we all said, "are those ufo's???"

4.  it appeared to be flying very low, perhaps at the same altitude as the goodyear blimp?  it was hovering, moving foward very slowly.  i looked at the traffic around me and saw others had also seen it and their jaws were dropped as well.  we were travelling nw, and the three orbs were directly in front of us just up of the horizon, and the big black ship was on our right.  the main thing was the three orbs, swirling colors that seemed transparent, but weren't were what got our attention.

5.  i was in awe.  as a new convert, and fundamentalist, it was perplexing, as i had nothing to relate it to. i wanted the pastor to pull over.  i was drawn to the orbs and the ship.  i wanted to savor the experience. we all were in awe at first, but my pastor insisted that they were demon ships and started praying and stepped on the gas.  when we arrived in colorado springs, the pastor and all of us exclaimed what we had seen, and we all marvelled.  i was very dissappointed that they were perceived as "demon" ships.  i didn't sense or feel anything negative whatsoever. on the contrary, i was very drawn to them, without any fear.  

6.  my pastor kept on driving and wouldn't stop so i have no idea how long those flying things were up there.  it seemed we saw them at least for several minutes, with no indication of them dissappearing.

final note:  both my pastor and myself were both active duty air force at 6the time, stationed at barksdale afb, la.  although i am no longer a part of that religious organization, it was an experience i never forgot.  i apologize about forgetting the exact date, but it was somewhere around dec 27 - 29, 1987.  there was a program about ufos, and i wasn't paying attention until i heard the word, "football field" and the memories flooded back. i find it interesting that someone else used that exact same description as i had.  all i know is somewhere out there, there are four people that were in the car with me, that witnessed this event, as well.
content.summary: 3 orbs & huge black oblong ship

content.detailedDescription:
1) we were driving northbound on sr78 about 3 miles north of glamis.

2) in that area it is very dark and the lights from the object were noticeable as they reflected off the chocolate mts.

3) we thought it was a military helicopter but there was no noise, the object was too large, and the lights were too bright.

4) it was a triangle shape about 200 feet wide per side with brilliant lighting on the three edges and from the underneath that were pulsing in no particular sequence. the object hovered about 100 feet from the ground and 300 feet from the mountainside. the object moved slowly in a counterclockwise spin. the lights illuminated the ground and mountainside in periodical intervals.

5) both my friend and i were on our cell phones as we started to view the object. our initial reaction was telling the people on the phone that there is some type of military activity and commenting about the illumination of the object. as we drove closer the object was too large to be a military helicopter or search and rescue vehicle. we then commented that it may be a balloon similar to the military balloon on us95 at the yuma proving ground. as we debated, we started to notice that the object had three sides. the object was all black and was unreflective with absolutely no noise. we came about ��� of a mile southeast from the object as we continued north on sr78. at the closes point we could see the object from the reflective illumination from its lights and it was moving in a slow counterclockwise spin. our reaction at that time was that we were seeing an unidentified flying object and we started to tell the people on the phone while we were slowing down to get a better view. as we slowed down to stop on the side of the road our cell phones all turned off at the same time. not loss of cell signal or service and not dead batteries or turning them off, the two phones just turned off. we then were fearful of the object and started to drive off.

6) we lost sight of the object as we drove off the object���s lights started to dim and in one big flash of light the object was not there or at least not visible to us. note, that the flash of light was not blinding just radiant enough to conceal the object. the light through this whole sighting was not comparable to conventional lighting as i���ve seen from helicopters or other airplanes. the light had a soft glow but was very bright and the shadows of the trees and shrubs on the side of the mountain were not sharp but defused. it gave off light as a cold light stick would.
content.summary: A large triangle object with pulsing light was hovering near the chocolate mt. gunnery range

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside (alone) on my screened-in front porch to sneak a cigarette (i���ve been trying to drop the habit).  i was facing south looking towards the side of the k-mart store a few houses down at the end of my street wishing to myself that there were not so many lights on that street when, off in the distance, i (barely) noticed this orb-like object.  my first idea was that it was a planet, though that did not make rational sense because it appeared much closer than a planet would to the naked eye.  suddenly, this object moved sideways to the right��� then the left��� then upwards a bit and again erratically sideways, sometimes hovering for a second or two but then always resuming its path in moving up.  by this point, my heart began racing because i realized that what i was seeing did not make any sense.  i stood there and watched the object as it continued this erratic pattern across the sky until my view was obscured by the roof over my porch.  i ran outside to the other side of the house so that i was facing east and again found the object continuing its path.  some people on the beach (i live 2 blocks from the beach) set off some fireworks (the low-grade kind that can be bought at any store around here).  the fireworks shot into the sky a distance roughly equal to 4 or 5 two-story houses.  the orb, by this point, had moved north/northeast past the fireworks and--even with the extra light in the sky���the object did not appear to reflect the light.  for a moment after the fireworks, the object seemed to move a little fast and within seconds of that it disappeared into the clouds.  i stood there in awe for a few seconds waiting for any possible reappearance, but nothing.  immediately afterwards, i called my family to share what i had just seen.

i am still unable to make rational sense of this.  the object made no sound and moved steadily as if on a path, but erratically.  additionally, the object did not seem to give off any colors as an airplane or helicopter would.  the object was perfectly round, which is why i describe it as an orb.  because it was night, it was hard to tell if the object itself was colored���the only way i can describe it is that it seemed to blend in with the night sky.  the only reason i noticed the shape is because it had a faint, but distinct outline which seemed to give off a soft glow.  by glow, i do not mean that the object itself was glowing���i mean the only glow was in the outline.  beyond that, the only other description i can offer is that the object appeared to have been a dark or matte metallic.

weather was partly to mostly cloudy in areas, no noticeable wind, and there were sporatic shots of lightning way, way off in the distance.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Erratically moving orb disappears behind clouds in night sky.

content.detailedDescription:
We arrived 25 min early for church and noted a bright daytime star.  i used the church's cross at the front of the church to determine movement.  its movement was so slow, that without reference, you would not notice any (i have observed and photographed the iss, it was not a satellite).  it seemed to move west slightly, then east slightly.  a jet flew by at about 30,000 near the object... the object appeared to be at least 4 time the altitude (maybe higher).  the object moved south (about the with of my fist at arms length) and disappeared.  another star like object was noticed (about half as bright) at the origin of the first object).  by then, church was starting and we went indoors.  the object(s) was self illuminous or really high up to reflect the sun.
the area of the sky was facing east, up about a 60 degree angle (i can measure it more accurately if needed).  mercury, venus and saturn were at about 110 degrees and not visible at that time of day.  what was it??????
content.summary: High altitude day time star, moved disappeared and reappeared where it started.. witnessed

content.detailedDescription:
My boyfriend and i had just finished dinner when the phone rang, we almost didn't answer.It was our neighbors who told us to come outside and look at the lights in the sky.
we went into the backyard and at first i saw nothing at all.
so i went into our front yard to get a better look from around the tall trees.That's when i saw these lights just floating in the sky.I yelled at everyone i could see it, then my neighbors told me to come in their back yard. we all just stood there in awe trying to come up with every explanation.I thought maybe it could be a helicopter chasing someone down, but it made no noise at all.It was very bright.It would go from left to right then very far down to very high up,then descend back down again.Sometimes it would just stay put for a while.It changed colors from blue to green red and white, sometimes it was all the colors at the same time.
our neighbors had seen a few others before they called us out, they said it was like they were playing with each other.I got in my car and left to drive towards it a little more, so i could get around all the trees.I had lost it.Should have stayed home, because my boyfriend and the neighbors said a few more came out then it was just the one again.Then they got scared because they thought it was coming towards them,they went in the house.
i never grabbed for my video camera or my digital camera.My neighbor was trying to get it on his camera phone but it would not show up.I wish i had got out the camera!
i waited for it last night but no luck seeing it.
i got this website off our local news.I am trying to find out if others have reported the same lights that night.
i think it was flying near the indian reservation near us.
i live in south scottsdale, we were facing east.Near arizona casino.
content.summary: Very bright lights red, blue, white, and green could not make out a shape maybe triangler or round

content.detailedDescription:
I came outside onto my screened-in front porch to sneak a cigarette (i've been trying to quit).  while out there, i was just pacing when i noticed an object in the sky off in the distance.  my first thought was that it looked like a planet, though it was considerably too close to be a planet.  suddenly, i saw the orb-like object jet to the right and then back to the left.  my heart began racing and i stood there watching this object continue this erratic pattern of movement... back and forth, while steadily moving up farther into the sky.  when i could no longer see it from where i was standing (it had moved northeast and my view was obstructed by the roof over my porch) i ran outside to the other side of my house.  some people on the beach set off some fireworks (low grade kind you can buy in any store around here) which shot into the sky a distance equal to 4 or 5 two-story houses.  i use this as a reference because despite the fireworks, the object was an even farther distance and did not seem to relect any light from the fireworks.  at that point the object seemed to move a bit faster steadily moving into the night sky over the beach until my view of the object was obscured by clouds.

the only other things i can say about this object are:

1.  there was no sound coming from the object.
2.  the object was shaped like an "orb" (completely round)and seemed to blend in with the sky.  there was a slight soft outline, but other than that there were no lights.  i got the impression that the object was a matte or dark metal because it did not reflect anything and it blended almost seamlessly into the sky.
3.  it was a night sky and partly to mostly cloudy.  

if anyone saw this as well or if anyone has questions, please feel free to contact me.
content.summary: Erratically moving orb disappears behind clouds in night sky.

content.detailedDescription:
At 9:30-9:45pm, i was preparing to leave for work.  i work at a company which is located reasonably close to miramar marine corp station.  just before opening my car door, i saw a bright light on the western horizon -- about two to three times as bright as jupiter.  thinking it was a plane, i stopped, and watched as it approached.  usually, f-18s are landing about this time at night.

as the vehicle started to come into better view, i noticed a few odd things about the vehicle:

1) both right- and left-hand wing lights were white, and about the same intensity as the front light.  normal airplanes will tend to have a red/green light combination instead.

2) the right-hand "wing" light was strobing more or less once every two seconds.  the red strobe followed, synchronized, approximately half-second after.  typical airplane strobes are located on both wings, and never on the underbelly of a fuselage, and tend to strobe concurrently or in bursts (e.G., three flashes, then no flashes for about a second, etc).

3) the red strobe was located in the geometric center of the lights, which is quite an unusual location to put any airplane 'red light'.

4) regardless of the location in the sky, all lights were uniform in brightness, and all strobes could be seen plainly.  that is, the lights this thing produced were omni-directional, not focused forward like in normal aircraft.

as it got closer, my suspicions were confirmed as it made absolutely, positively, 100% no sound what-so-ever.  the air was still, except for the occasional gentle breeze.  the vehicle also was flying relatively low; its arc-width in the sky appeared to be similar to that of an f-18, but made no attempts to lower its altitude at all.  for this reason, i cannot even begin to guess how far away this object was.

it was completely silent as traveled by towards the east, in a straight line.  total transit time was approximately 15 to 20 seconds.  i lost sight of it after it went behind some trees.

very excited that i saw my first flying triangle, i wanted to get home and write an e-mail to my father about this incident.  after arriving home, at approximately 10:15, i got out of the car, and looked up (i almost always do this anyway, being an amateur astronomy buff).  lo and behold, there were both normal airplanes (which made distinct noises) and *three* flying triangles traveling in the sky over my street.

the triangles at home lacked any strobes of any kind.  just three white lights, forming equilateral triangles, gliding noiselessly in the sky.  this was easily confirmed after all normal aircraft had left the area, and all that remained were triads of moving lights without sound.

one was making a course change in the form of a wide, sweeping, graceful arc.  the other two were flying in straight lines, normal to each other in their respective geometric planes.  they were lower in altitude than the normal aircraft flying in the area, as the a plane that went behind one of the triangles was occulted by the flying triangle.  they were also higher in altitude than the first triangle i saw while leaving work, however.  despite this, they were actually moving *faster* in the sky than the first triangle i've seen.  however, their speeds were consistent, and showed no evidence of zigging, zagging, or other characteristically "ufo" flight patterns.  i lost sight of each of these triangles as they also disappeared behind trees or approached the horizon.  total display time here was about 1.5 minutes, estimated.

the eerie thing about this was that i wasn't frightened at all.  and while i enjoyed the display, i wasn't mesmorized by it.  odd as it may sound, and usually quite contrary to most ufo reportings i've read previously, my life just went on as normal, quite confident that i'll be seeing more of these in the future, and that there is absolutely nothing "wrong" or out of place with these things.  they are easily confused for airplanes by people who don't know how to tell the difference, so i suspect that these things are just all over the place, and most people don't realize what they're seeing.

from now on, i will be keeping a digital camera in my car, just in case this happens again.  i would love to snap a few pictures next time i see one.

thanks.
content.summary: 4 flying triangles; one while leaving work, three upon arriving at home.

content.detailedDescription: 1.Co.Rd. 14, lauderdale co. alabama, riding home with my dad from work and school. we came around a curve and onto long stretch of road called oakland stretch (5 miles of straight road)2. saw flashing varicolored lights on one side. 3. didn't know what it was so watched it closely.4. the object never moved the entire time but hovered over a power line and street light about 200 feet high. as we got closer became very interested and watched intently. when became very near asked dad to stop car so could observe more closely but he would not although he did see it also. i was 21 at the time and in college. we drove directly under the object which appeared to be the size of a medium size house. i rolled down window and looked straight at bottom of object which was silvery metallic with flashing varicolored lights on one side (the one facing east). the object emitted no detectable sound. there was a line on bottom which was square shaped but with rounded edges. i implored my dad to stop,saying "what the hell is that?" had no camera with me. he would not stop--don't know why, maybe scared. he is now 78 and still remembers it clearly as i do. 6. went around curve in road. moonless night but street lamp reflected off bottom of object. object in full clear view for about 7 minutes and still there when we went around curve and proceeded out of sight. i was at the university of alabama in 1972 and stanton friedman came to speak there and i went to the meeting, but did not report the sighting because i was shy of becoming involved. i did not raise my hand when he asked people to indicate if they ever had a sighting--later regretted not reporting so am doing so now. what could it have been? it was close, real, seen by myself and father for about 7 minutes, drove right under it, i could not think of anything terrestrial that it could be unless secret weapon or aircraft of government--doubted this seriously. i treasure the memory in a way but wish i had had a camera there with me.
content.summary: Observed silver triangular with rounded edges, varicolored lights on one side, for seven minutes while riding with my father on long straight road, went under object,it  was hovering,  looked straight up at bottom of it, no sound, about 200 feet high.

content.detailedDescription: My son & i were traveling interstate 55 between mccomb & magnolia ms. late afternoon on a sunday. as we were headed south it came over the trees to our left ahead of us in plain sight, then it just stopped dead still, we slowed down almost to a stop when my son who was about 11 or 12 at the time began screaming for me not to stop. i speeded up & we went under it & i rolled down my window to hear if any sounds & there was none at all, it also had few tiny twinkling lights in few spots. it was a dull grey in color and large i'd say football field size maybe. after we went under it & got passed it a ways i slowed down again & pulled to side of road & looked back & as we were looking to see what it was doing it just left in a high rate of speed(like a flash) still no sound what so ever. we then came home called our local very small airport & they said they saw nothing on radar, then we called local sheriffs office & reported it, they said no other calls came in... but strange thing is we were on an interstate highway & we noticed we were the only car north & south, no others in sight.. we have been bothered by this sighting all these yrs wondering why we only saw it...
content.summary: Traveled over trees & stopped, no sound

content.detailedDescription: when you look up on a clear night here in fallon, when there is little ambient light, just the ske you will see these lights from one to 3 at a time crossingthe sky. sattelites go east west, these move north south, and change direction, dip into lower altitude and get brighter, then climb and fade out in brightness. some move slow some very fast, much faster and definatley higher than comercial or military aircraft. i work security for fallon nas at boeing on the grave shift, but also have seen them at home at night if there is no full moon or excess light. i know that there are no aircraft that fly that high that regularly and have no running lights, or flashers. they seem to almost wobble side to side as they move at times.
content.summary: Yellowish very  high altitude light , no flashing like aircraft running lights. and make no sound, or jet noise

content.detailedDescription: when you look up on a clear night here in fallon, when there is little ambient light, just the ske you will see these lights from one to 3 at a time crossingthe sky. sattelites go east west, these move north south, and change direction, dip into lower altitude and get brighter, then climb and fade out in brightness. some move slow some very fast, much faster and definatley higher than comercial or military aircraft. i work security for fallon nas at boeing on the grave shift, but also have seen them at home at night if there is no full moon or excess light. i know that there are no aircraft that fly that high that regularly and have no running lights, or flashers. they seem to almost wobble side to side as they move at times.
content.summary: Yellowish very  high altitude light , no flashing like aircraft running lights. and make no sound, or jet noise

content.detailedDescription: My children and one of their friends were with me in the car as we were driving home in our subdivision to our house. as i turned the corner i saw the object moving slowly above the treetops of several houses out of my driverside window. it was 24-48 feet above the treetops and very large. i was able to see the object completely to know it was not a plane or anyother object i have ever seen in my life. it was a solid triangular shaped object that was illuminating a bright whitish silver light and had a bright blue glow aroung the perimeter of the object for about 5-6 feet out. as soon as i yelled at the kids my daughter looked and screamed and then object increased its speed flying over the treetops and across the sky heading west. my heart started beating so fast, i never in my life thought something like that really existed. it was low enough that i know what i saw. there is no mistake about what i saw. i came straight home and when we got out of the car to come inside our house all the dogs in our subdivision were barking. when the object increased its speed and flew across the treetops out of view there was no sound no movement of the treetops, nothing. i lost sight of the object after it flew west over the treetops.
content.summary: Solid white glowing triangular shaped object

content.detailedDescription: I was in my backyard trimming shrubs, when i noticed to the east what appeared at first to be a plane flying south.  sky conditions were bright and very clear and the object was about 20 degrees above the horizon.  the object made no noise, did not have wings and was flying slower than a plane would.  it was primarily bright silver though there was also some red on it.  i tried to make out details and there were some structures toward the aft end.  otherwise, it was streamline in profile, though "stubby."  it flew more slowly than an airplane would as viewed from a similar distance.  again, no noise was noted and it flew in a straight line, out of view after a few moments.  it would be surprising if no one else saw this object.  it's distance was hard to judge, but was probably on the order of a mile.
content.summary: Silver and red without wings

content.detailedDescription:
A group of around 10 from a music feastival of 100 saw these lights.  

a friend spotted it in the sky and told us where to look.

i thought it was a ufo.

the constellation of scorpio was low to the horizon.  the three lights came from 'far to the right'  and moved across the sky towards scorpio where it dipped down and appeared to move through the tail of scorpio between the first star (closest to the body of scorpio) and the next star in the tail of scorpio.  the object appeared to take up about a sixth of the distance between the two scorpio stars.

i was excited...So was everyone else...

the object slowly dimmed out of site after going through scorpio's tail.

from arms length, it appeared to be around an inch on each side...As i said it took up around a sixth of the distance between the two stars closest to the body of scorpio.
content.summary: Triangle of three lights moving insync across the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the car driving.  i first noticed the object because of the lights, but i thought it was just a reflection.  then i  
got closer and i realized it was an ufo.  i thought it was a kite at first, because it was moving as if it were tied to something.  it had a choreographed movement.  it would spin, dart for left to right, do a barrell roll, dive then come back up to where it started and begin again.  during the sighting, i felt happy and curious, but i was trimbeling a bit.  after the sighting,i was very scared and shakey, i was worried about my safety.  i lost sight of the object, because i drove closer then i looked away and i never saw it again after that.
content.summary: Triangle, about the size of a car, red and blue lights

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on a outdoor deck overlooking the chesapeake bay smoking a cigarette. i was looking towards the south, south east when i noticed a large bright orange object relativly low in the sky 10-15 miles from me. i first thought the object may have been the planet mars understanding mars position and that at this time mars was supposed to be very large and bright. at first it acted as a planet should and remained in position. the object did appear to twinkle some but i chalked that up to atmospheric conditions. several minutes later (5-10) the object began slowly moving to the north. as it moved to the north it's brighness began to fade changing into a barely visible flashing red and white color then eventually disappearing. the object appeared over again several times almost in the same area repeating the same actions. a few times during this period as the bright object moved away and slowly dissapeared it was replaced by another bright orange object which would again move away in the same direction. at one point in my observation a helicopter with no lights on flew directly over my position and toward the object (n.W to. s.E). i lost track of the helicopter when i went into the house to tell other people what was happening. my initial reaction was of dis-belief. however as i stood and watched this occur over and over for at least a half an hour i thought it had to be something other than a planet or a plane, comet or helicopter. eventually the object moved away, faded out and never returned.I have stood on that same porch many times looking over the bay and at the sky. i have seen many planes flying at night and have worked for an airline and know what a plane flying at night looks like. i know how planets act and they don't usually move away then reappear. only one other person in my group had the chance to view this and saw pretty much what i described. after the sighting i (we) did not go into any details with the others in our group because as can be expected they were skeptical. i just left it at that and then later reviewed my photographs and decided to contact mufon to help determine what this may have been.
content.summary: Large orange object entered the sky then moved away several times

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend pointed out 3 lights in a triangular formation while at a drive in movie. the lead light was about twice as bright as the two following and the back end of the triangle was narrower than the sides. the lights were all white and non blinking. we weren't able to tell if it was a solid object or three objects in formation because it didn't pass in front of any of the visible stars. it moved very slowly to the south east then faded from view.
content.summary: Triangular formation of 3 lights moving very slowly.

content.detailedDescription:
We were driving northbound on the i-15 towards las vegas.  it was around 11pm june 24th, 2005.  we were approximately 20 miles past barstow, 40 miles away from baker when we spotted a solitare white light off to the northwest side of the highway.  as we continued northbound, two additional lights came into view, equal distance and angle from the center light.  it was not moving as far as we could tell and seemed to be a star system more or less.  but it seemed to be getting closer as we drove closer.  it was.  as we drove closer towards the lights, we noticed we could not see the stars within the triangle shape of the lights.  then we passed it.  we were northeast of it as we continued north on the hwy.  this, in my mind, proved to me that it was not a star configuration or a star at all.  
we lost sight of it becuase we never stopped.
content.summary: Driving n on i-15 to vegas, just past barstow, 40 miles to baker, triangle sighted off the left side of the i-15 headed southbound.

content.detailedDescription:
At 11:00 am cdt on sunday, 6/26/2005 (i had just looked at my car's clock), i was driving by myself in my car, going west on 166th street in south holland, il, approaching the intersection of 166th street and indiana avenue, where i was going to turn left (north) onto indiana avenue.  it was a perfectly clear morning, although a little hazy.  while still driving on 166th street heading east, and approaching the intersection with indiana avenue, i saw in the eastern sky, right above the treeline (actually between two bunches of trees in the distance), a dark grey or black rectangular object hanging in the sky, which seemed to be tapered on its lower end.  it was about the size of a dime, if held at arms-length.  its shape was like a rectangle with its longer measure pointing up and down, but its lower end was more tapered than its top end, as if maybe the lower end was pointed away from me and the top end was pointed towards me, so that the top end appeared bigger and the lower end smaller.  i don't know how far away it was, or how big it was, but i'd estimate, just by the way it looked through the haze, and the fact that it was very low on the horizon, that it was only a few miles away.

it most definitely was not a plane.  i suppose it could have been the rectangular underside of a dark green huey-type army helicopter, but it sure didn't look like that, and i can't think of any reason why a military helicopter would be in that area (there aren't any military bases nearby), and hovering with its nose pointed up at such an angle, so that i could see its entire undercarriage from several miles away.  i think that such an extreme manuever would have put any helicopter at risk of crashing.  also, huey-type military helicopters make a very loud "whump-whump-whump" sound with their rotor blades that can be heard (and sometimes even felt) from miles away, but i didn't hear any sound.  my first thought was that it might be some kind of strange rectangular advertising balloon, or a cluster of balloons in a rectangular formation, even though i'd never seen a rectangular configuration of balloons before.  and, it just didn't didn't look like any balloons i'd ever seen.  it looked like a solid object.  i actually said aloud to myself, "what the hell is that?"  i drive east on 166th street every sunday, and i'd never seen anything like that before.  it was very low on the horizon, and i was able to catch only a few glimpses of it between the many trees in that area, as i drove.  when i first saw it on 166th street, it seemed to be stationary, but after i got onto indiana avenue going north, i realized that it must have moved, because i couldn't find it again in the location where i first saw it.  about 3 minutes later (11:03 am), i got another glimpse of it as i drove east on 154th street, near the intersection of 154th street and cottage grove avenue (i drive fast).  at that time, it had definitely moved quite a distance to the northwest, because now it was almost due north of me, behind st. jude church, but still several miles away, and low on the horizon.  after picking up my mom at st. jude church, i told her about it, and then drove further east on 154th street, trying to find it again.

about 3 minutes later (11:06 am), i saw it one last time as i drove east on 154th street (also called pulaski road) in calumet city, near the intersection of 154th street and michigan city road.  it was now directly north of me, way off in the distance behind dirksen junior high school, and it now looked like an elongated dark grey or black teardrop, with the larger bulbous end facing down.  it was also obviously much farther away to the north, because it was more obscured by haze at that point, and smaller.

after seeing it in the distance behind dirksen junior high school, i turned left onto calhoun street, going north, attempting to get past all the trees in that area and find it again.  but when i got to a relatively clear area near calhoun street and sibley blvd. a few seconds later, it was gone.

this was definitely the strangest thing i've ever seen in the sky.  i'm still trying to find a logical explanation for what it was.  i thought maybe there was an air show downtown, and that this object might have been some weird aircraft that was part of the show.  but as far as i know, there was no air show going in downtown chicago on 6/26/2005.  then i thought, maybe it was some type of large advertising display being pulled by a small plane.  but it was just too big and bulky-looking to be that.  usually, such aerial advertising displays are of the long, thin banner variety.  any advertising display which was so big and bulky would have interfered with the aerodynamics of the plane pulling it, and caused the plane to crash.  then i thought, maybe it was just a strange rectangular balloon.  but it was just going too damned fast to be any type of balloon.  i've seen goodyear-type balloons in this area before, so i know what they look like, and how slow they travel.  if it was a balloon, it could not have covered such a distance and disppeared from view so quickly.  and, as i mentioned, it definitely was not a plane, and i don't believe that it was a helicopter, either.

i would like to know what the hell this thing was.  it's really bugging me now.  i actually called the non-emergency numbers for both the south holland and calumet city police, and asked them if anyone had reported anything strange in the sky at around 11:00 am, but they both said that nothing had been reported.  that doesn't really surprise me, due to the short length of time it was visible.  but i would like to know if anyone else saw anything strange in the sky that morning, or whether it was just a big, dark colored helicopter or something.
content.summary: Dark rectangular object in the sky, which later appeared as a dark teardrop.

content.detailedDescription: My brother was at a summer solstice party in calgary alberta. he saw this object and shot a photo. he sent me the photo and asked what i thought. sorry i don't have any more details yet for you.
content.summary: Saw object, took photo

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in the house and looking out the window at the time, when i noticed two small lights which i at first thought were part of a helicopter but as they moved apart and in different directions i immediately realized this was not normal. while i was watching the two small lights something really large came toward me from the opposite direction (from my right) two small lights were on my left. these small lights were in view for approx. 20 minutes. the large object was in view for approx. 15 minutes. the large object was kind of oval but could have been a cylinder with what looked like lights along the side of it (might have been portals)...
my only feeling was amazement and i actually pinched myself to make sure i was wide awake and i also moved around the house to see if i could see it from other windows and i could. i was not about to go outside though.
as soon as i saw it, it stayed at approx. above the trees (30 to 50 ft)and hovered. when it left it moved very slowly and took it 5 to 10 minutes to completely dissapear from my view. it went straight out away from me (north).
content.summary: Saw two small lights...At first thought they were part of a helicopter...Looked at lights from various windows in the house and they were still there.

content.detailedDescription: My kids were playing in the bed of my pick up at about 10 pm when they yelled to me in the garage. they were trying to point out this black triangle in the sky, after a few seconds i began seeing it also. i yelled for my wife, she came outside with her mother and we pointed it out to them. we all saw it clearly, it manuevered about but was generaly heading south. there were three fairly dim lights at each corner, it seemed to be a perfect triangle. at moments you could pick out the edges of it but it really blended in with the night sky. it was about as large as my hand, i have no idea of its altitude. it didnt make any sound, and after about ten minutes it faded out. during the observation i tried calling several friends in the area, but none of them answered. my kids kept asking if it was a ufo, i said it was, but we dont no if its ours or from some place else. the kids were not afraid untill it was over. they didnt want to sleep alone that night. my daghters are 12 and 14.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Family of 5 watching 3 small lights in a perfect triangle hoover through sky

content.detailedDescription:
Tuesday morning during the wee hours i went out for cigarettes !! at that time i witnessed an ufo which i reported to you guys upon returning home !! when i also walked over for smokes in the wee hours of wednesday and friday mornings , it was gone !! 

i just came back from buying 3 packs at hess and it's back !! 

the other time i saw this it moved swiftly south to a direct line with chapel street , in mere seconds , hovered , did a very tight u-turn and returned to where it had been hovering previously just as rapidly and all silently !! 

this time it expressed no such interest in me, if interest that was , however, it did react to my presence seemingly !! 

i had been watching a 2 hour segment on asteroids , comets ,meteors , meterorites and impact craters on the history channel and ran out of cigarettes !! i might have previously mentioned my interest in this topic !! about 5 minutes before 2:00 am i left to walk down to the local hess station on north main street to pick up 3 packs of smokes !!  i looked over my shoulder and the same ufo , flashing or strobing red and green lights alternating with a bright blue light , in that same repeat pattern was hovering in the same position , at north - north-west and at about the same height !! 

there was quite a bit of cloud cover in that region of the sky obscuring all else !! i would take this to mean that i had been correct in my assessment that it was at about the height of your typical jetliner and below the cloud cover !! other stars and the moon were visible elsewhere in the sky !! in this particular region of the sky , the ufo was alone as nothing else was visible !!

i walked down to hess and picked up my smokes , my receipt is time-stamped at 2:06 am . i spoke with the cashier for a few moments and started walking home !! the ufo was still silently hovering at its' former location .

when i got to the rear of my apartment building it still had not moved !! i decided to walk around the side to the front , near i would normally put out the trash for the weekly pickup !! in those few seconds , it silently and speedily moved a few degrees westward to north-west and resumed to hover silently !! the building hid the ufo from my line of sight as i walked around to the front , however that took no longer than a few seconds !! it seemingly reacted to my presence by changing its' station to that new north-west bearing !!

nothing else was visible in this region as the slight cloud cover was still obscuring all else , ergo , it maintained this altitude and remained below the cloud cover !! 

having satisfied myself that it had returned , that it seemed larger than your typical jetliner , hovered silently , moved swifter than anything i have previously encountered in the way of aviation , was at the height of your typical jetliner , that it was not a jet , not a jetliner , had no wings and no tail assembly , was not a blimp , was not a balloon and was not a helicopter , i returned to my apartment as i was missing the gem shows on qvc , i am a gem collector and wanted to see what they were offering !!

once again , this seemed to be black in colour , flashed the same lights in the same repeat patterns , and was circular in shape with a slight doming to the bottom and top !! 

according to our government , what i have now recently witnessed twice does not exist !!!!! 

my reaction might best be described as picque with our government !! during the 90's these type of objects were visible over manchester , n.H. , the monadnock region and later , a few years ago , over the lakes region !!  

over manchester, during that time frame i reported viewing the typical "saucer" shape hovering silently over the local federal bldg. to dan of sen. gregg's office !! on another night walking back from the east side vista grocery store  , during the fall , i saw 5 glowing orbs in a "vee" formation flying towards the north - north - east during a friday night highschool footbal game at gill stadium !! during that time of the year , birds and waterfowl should have been heading south !!

on a third occasion i saw the triangular shaped craft which bore no resemblence to the stealth bomber or the stealth fighter !! i reported these sightings to dan at sen. gregg's office and trusted them to follow up on them as i had no idea to whom such reports should or could be made !! trusting dan , i kept no records individually !! i now rather doubt if they even bothered to follow up on my reports !! as it has been quite some time since those sightings , i thought they were quite done with our part of the country !! 

i say "they" because quite obviously some intelligence is behind the design , manufacture , and purpose along with the navigation of these vehicles which bear not even the remotest resemblence to anything built by boeing and lockeed martin etc.!! not even dornier nor airbus can lay claim to credit for these crafts !!

i have only just realised that this craft in relation to a star , as it was closer, was substanstually larger than a star would appear !! that has only now just occured to me !!
content.summary: I saw the same ufo as i had seen the other night which would have been about 3 or so in the morning ofttuesday morning .

content.detailedDescription: I was driving west on rt. 25 (tenney mt. hwy.), just before the plymouth/rumney town line.  to the north i noticed a light in the air that seemed to flicker.  then i noticed a craft which seemed dark and that only had a single light on it.  there were no normal navigational lights that you would find on an airplane.  object was travelling east.  these lights were just north of plymouth and rumney, east of stinson mt.  the second object that was travelling east was going as fast as a jet or perhaps as fast as a high-performance prop aircraft (400 knots plus).  i am reporting this because it seemed unusual to me.  it isn't every day you see a flickering light in the sky and then a craft which seems dark and with only a single light.  i am a little afraid of ufos so i didn't stick around to observe more.
content.summary: Noticed flying craft with no naviagation lights but with only single light.

content.detailedDescription:
1. my wife and i were sitting in backyard patio looking up at night sky
2. was a formation of 4-5 luminescent triangular objects traveling silently (no sound)and extremely rapidly northbound, one object was a bit "wobbly" - were not airplanes (we see commercial airtrafic at night on regular basis)
3. at first we were not sure what we were seeing, honestly i wondered if it was a flock of bird being lit from underneath gliding over us  - but they moved too fast and were not "flapping" and were more triangular than a bird or airplane
4. weird aerial events started at 11:50pm. it was a group of 4-5 objects triangular in shape all luminescent underneath (a hazy lit grey - solid - no blinking lites or anything in terms of coloration one sees on commercial air traffic). my wife and i had no idea what the objects were either but they were flying in formation - no doubt about that, one appeared to wobble badly then corrected itself in flight. both my wife and i agreed they were odd and "ufo" like.  we only caught site of them as they flew overhead rapidly heading from the south -northbound and we lost them in trees as they progressed. moments later as we moved to try to see into the distance we saw two more coming from the southeast heading northward. we continued to watch the skys and at 11:20pm i noticed a bright light (thought it was a star at first) rapidly move northbound (appeared to be much, much higher than the "triangles") it moved i called my wifes attention to it and we both saw it travel rapidly in a straight line from south to north disappearing from our view as it progressed across the sky. more strange aerial phenomenon continued - at aproximately 11:50am i noticed another star like light (again very high) this time travelling from the western part of the sky east, (much faster than the northbound one)again i called my wifes attention to it and it passed overhead and we lost it (our house obstucted us from viewing further as the object passed over it continuing eastward. the two "travelling stars" were traveling at a very high rate of speed - covering too much sky in too litle time to be an airplane (even one traveling near supersonic). from almost directly overhead until i lost it in the trees the northbound "traveling star" crossed sky until out of sight in about 20 - 30 seconds max, the other travelling eastbound was out of sight within 10 seconds easily. all objects were silent. the "traveling stars" were traveling in precise straight lines. finally at 12:05pm just before going into the house to say goodnight my wife and i both witnessed 2 more luminescent triangles flying in formation from the south east going northbound - this time they seemed to vanish just after we lost sight of them going past some treetops across the road. 
5. my wife is more of a skeptic than i am, she admits to seeing ufos but is not sure who/what those ufos were. i was excited and fascinated, she was more reserved and quite quiet about the whole thing.
6. objects passed into the horizon overtop trees and buildings - we lost sight of them then.

it was amazing to see some things frankly i never thought i would experience with my wife in my lifetime. but to see all the wierd aerial activity in one night was quite bizarre.

i'm deathly curious what ground radar reported (if you can find out).
content.summary: 4 luminescent triangles northbound, 2 more sighted twice, two other strange lights...
